main event: On multiple evenings in October 1966, a witness observed unusual flashing lights in the sky over Westhampton, Long Island, New York.
interesting points: The lights appeared stationary for extended periods before disappearing below the horizon., The sightings included red and green lights, consistent with the characteristics of Arcturus or possible aircraft., The observations were described as resembling a rotating beacon., Witnesses reported sightings on various nights, highlighting consistent patterns., The witness had prior experience as a plane spotter, suggesting familiarity with conventional aircraft.
sighted object: flashing lights in the night sky
witness description: A retired individual with an interest in astronomy
